tool_description: Fetch the YouTube Search Results and the information for each item for a specific search term, without any limits!
name: Youtube Search
title: Youtube Search

api_list.name: search_bingSearch_get

optional_parameters.name: num
optional_parameters.description: Maximum quantity of links to return, valid values are integers: options (10,15,30,50)

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: The region parameter value is two-letter language with a dash and two-letter country code. Search results from specific region of origin. Example: en-us

api_list.name: search_yandexSearch_get

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The language parameter value is two-letter language code
